Name: OnlySociety: Dawn
About the game: Only Society Dawn is a shooter video game developed and published by Code Society. Enemy will spawn in waves, obtain better weapon by looting the dead and survive Dark Rock minions. Player will change from explorer mode in third person and shooting mode in first person. With the dynamic weather system, player is able to experience real world environment transition in this apocalypse fantasy world.
